column5: We are now accepting applications for the Management (Operations and Supply Management) course for January 2022. Please visit our website for more information.Do you have strong commercial awareness and an interest in supply management in today’s global and highly competitive markets?The MSc Management (Operations and Supply Management) programme at Swansea University is for students with a clear interest in understanding how products and services are made and distributed and learning about how this process can be improved for 21st century companies. The degree has been specifically designed with a clear focus on management in an interconnected global community.
column7: Please visit our website for the Management (Operations and Supply Management) course fee information.
